import React, {useContext, useState, useEffect, useCallback} from 'react' import {OneChatMessage} from '../components/OneChatMessageComp' // ??? import {AuthContext} from '../context/AuthContext' export const ChatWorker =({ chat, token, chatId, socket}) => { console.log(chat.onlineUsers) const auth = useContext(AuthContext) const userId = auth.userId var messages = [{}, {}] // ????? // const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]) // const getFresh = useCallback ( (newMessage) => {setMessages([newMessage].concat(messages))}, [setMessages, messages] ) socket.on('New user connected to chatroom', (user, login) => { console.log('Пришел: ', user, login) }) socket.on('New user message from server', (newMessage) => { console.log('Сообшение: ', newMessage) // getFresh(newMessage, messages) const _ = [newMessage].concat(messages) messages = _ // a.concat(messages) console.log(messages) }) socket.on('User left chatroom', (user, login) => console.log('Ушел: ', user, login)) // Make emit for server to get old message in this chat. Second parametr count=50 is optional // Backend server will turn this user in onilne status socket.on('Old messages', (oldMessages) => console.log(oldMessages)) socket.emit('Client just enter', chatId, userId) const sendHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const newMessageFromClient = event.target.elements.newMessageInput.value event.target.elements.newMessageInput.value = null // Emit this message to server socket socket.emit('New message from client', newMessageFromClient, chatId, userId) } return (
